user_query: I want to surprise my parents with a special anniversary gift. Can you suggest some unique and personalized gift ideas? Also, find me a reputable online store that offers gift wrapping and delivery services. Additionally, provide recommendations for anniversary celebration venues in their city.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of unique and personalized gift ideas suitable for an anniversary.
Identify reputable online stores that offer gift wrapping and delivery services.
Gather a list of recommended venues for anniversary celebrations in the parents' city.
Combine all findings and present the best gift ideas, online stores, and celebration venues.
